law.catch_line: Prohibited telephone solicitation acts and practices.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 581, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (07/15/2002). Under the authority of KRS 7.136, the Reviser of Statutes has corrected a clearly erroneous statutory reference in subsection (5) of this section as enacted in 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 2, by changing "KRS 367.46953" to "KRS 367.46963."
